was out riding her tricycle along with her cat when a dog came racing up to them and scared the cat

um once upon a time there was a little girl named Cinderella
and unfortunately her father passed away
and she was sent to live with um her stepmother and stepsisters um who were very jealous of her because she was so beautiful
and they made her do all the chores while they got to have all of the fun
as she got older her only friends were the farm animals and the mice that lived around the house and the farm
um one day the king decided that he was going to have a big celebration for his son to try to find a wife for his son
because he was getting older and he wanted to make sure that uh somebody was  would be uh able to succeed him when he was ready to retire as king
so  couriers went across the land and delivered the uh message or delivered invitations to all the eligible uh bachelorettes or unmarried women in the kingdom
and the  t the stepsisters were very excited
and Cinderella was excited too
but then they laughed at her saying
you can't go to the ball
you don't have a dress
you're just a scrub girl

um unfortunately her stepsisters were very jealous of her
and they thought that she would be too pretty and outshine them at the ball

um and she cried

but uh he couldn't catch up with her
she  Cinderella stumbled on the stairs on the way down to the carriage and left one of her golden slip or  one of her glass slippers on the stairs
uh she made it to the carriage and got home just in time
and the carriage turned back into a pumpkin
and the mice turned or  the horses turned back into mice

so  he sent couriers across the land again with the  g the glass slipper to see whose foot would fit the slipper
